SummaryEnglish: At the end of the second semester of third year of high school, four students are prepared for graduation and feel the ending to their high school life. But that changes a little with the arrival of a transfer student.

1.SummaryEnglish: Eita Izumi transfers to a new high school in his junior year. Upon arriving for his registration, he meets his childhood friend, Haruto Soma. They play a game of baseball, when Haruto reveals that Mio Natsume (Eita's childhood crush), also attends the high school.

2.SummaryEnglish: Haruto works up the courage to ask out Morikawa but does his confession go as well as he had envisioned it?

3.SummaryEnglish: The group reconnects after their trip to the aquarium but things take an unexpected turn when Ena takes an interest in Eita.

4.SummaryEnglish: Emotions run high as Haruto feels emboldened enough to finally confess his feelings, but will his words be able to reach the one he cares about?

5.SummaryEnglish: Things change between Haruto and Hazuki, and both of them try to deal with it in their own way. Mio, on the other hand, is trying to come to terms with her feelings.

6.SummaryEnglish: Tension is on the rise, as Haruto seeks guidance from Eita, on how to respond to Hazuki's message.

7.SummaryEnglish: Mio remembers Eita's kindness in middle school and starts to question her relationship with him. What will happen as Ena begins to spend more time with Eita?

8.SummaryEnglish: Ena finally decides to ask Eita on a date despite Mio's objection. Everything seems to be going well until Mio bumps into them.

9.SummaryEnglish: Mio finally chooses to confront her demons. In the meantime, Eita is working through his own dilemma with Ena.

10.SummaryEnglish: Eita seems to be coming to terms with his feelings. In the meantime, Mio is starting to learn what is truly important to her.

11.SummaryEnglish: As entrance exams rear their head, Eita can't help but remember Mio's expression when she noticed his phone. What will happen as their paths start to diverge?

12.SummaryEnglish: Eita fails his entrance exam. He receives a text from Mio telling him she passed the test for her first choice. It's graduation and everyone says their good-byes. Eita tells Komiya that he was happy when she confessed to him but still, he can't go out with her because there is someone else he likes. After he left, she is seen crying in the club room. Eita runs into Mio at Joei; he confesses to liking her and she reciprocates.
